title: Dow Jones Futures: Amazon Prime Day, Facebook, Citigroup Lead Big Week For Stock Market Rally
text: Stock futures: The stock market rally continues with Amazon Prime Day, Facebook regulatory fears and Citigroup earnings in focus. Amazon, Facebook, Citigroup are all in buy range.

title: U.S. proposes barring big tech companies from offering financial services, digital currencies
text: A proposal to prevent big technology companies from functioning as financial institutions or issuing digital currencies has been circulated for discussion by the Democratic majority that leads the House Financial Services Committee, according to a copy of the draft legislation seen by Reuters.

title: Now Facebook Has to Cut a $5 Billion Check
text: Major news sources are reporting that the social media network has reached a deal with government regulators.

title: Facebook will never break through with Oculus, says one of the VR company's co-founders
text: Jack McCauley was one of the six Oculus co-founders, but he's also one of its biggest bears, telling CNBC he doesn't think there's a market for virtual reality video gaming.

title: Google, Apple, Amazon and Facebook face off with Congress this week
text: The hearings will be on antitrust and Facebook's upcoming Libra cryptocurrency, but they're really about holding Silicon Valley to account.

title: Money’s no object for Facebook, so hit it where it hurts
text: If you want a measure of the problem society will have in controlling the tech giants, then ponder this: as it has become clear that the US Federal Trade Commission is about to impose a fine of $5bn (£4bn) on Facebook for violating a decree governing privacy breaches, the company’s share price went up!
